div.div: snake venom poison snake venom poisoning

entry.def: snake venom poison snake venom poisoning

sense.def: Alternative Names she hui shang 蛇虺傷 , injury caused by snake venom; du she shang chi 毒蛇傷 , injury caused by a poisonous snake; e she hui shang 惡蛇虺傷 , injury caused by the venom of a malign snake; she hui shang ren 蛇虺傷人 , a snake’s venom harms a person; du she shang 毒蛇傷 , injury caused by a poisonous snake; she shang du 蛇傷毒 , poisoning resulting from an injury caused by a snake; du she shang ren 毒蛇傷人 , a poisonous snake harms a person. Pathological Condition with major signs including all types of local reactions to poisoning, or those affecting the entire body, stimulated by the bites of a poisonous snake. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry cai ju ji shi 蔡苴機屎：主 蛇虺毒 , 兩頭麋屎也 , “It controls snake venom poisoning . These are the excrements of elks with two heads”.
